fields.title: The Hateful Eight
fields.description: The Hateful Eight is a 2015 American western mystery film written and directed by Quentin Tarantino.

fields.title: Zoolander No.2
fields.description: Zoolander 2 (also known as Zoolander No. 2 and 2oolander) is a 2016 American comedy film directed by Ben Stiller and written by John Hamburg, Justin Theroux, Stiller and Nick Stoller.

fields.title: The Shawshank Redemption
fields.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

fields.title: The Godfather
fields.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

fields.title: The Godfather: Part II
fields.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on his crime syndicate stretching from Lake Tahoe, Nevada to pre-revolution 1958 Cuba.

fields.title: The Dark Knight
fields.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the caped crusader must come to terms with one of the greatest psychological tests of his ability to fight injustice.

fields.title: 12 Angry Men
fields.description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

fields.title: Schindler's List
fields.description: In Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
fields.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

fields.title: Pulp Fiction
fields.description: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

fields.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
fields.description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

fields.title: Fight Club
fields.description: An insomniac office worker, looking for a way to change his life, crosses paths with a devil-may-care soap maker, forming an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more...

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
fields.description: A meek Hobbit and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the One Ring and the Dark Lord Sauron.

fields.title: Inception
fields.description: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

fields.title: Forrest Gump
fields.description: Forrest Gump, while not intelligent, has accidentally been present at many historic moments, but his true love, Jenny Curran, eludes him.

fields.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
fields.description: After the rebels have been brutally overpowered by the Empire on their newly established base, Luke Skywalker takes advanced Jedi training with Master Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader as part of his plan to capture Luke.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
fields.description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

fields.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
fields.description: A criminal pleads insanity after getting into trouble again and once in the mental institution rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

fields.title: Goodfellas
fields.description: Henry Hill and his friends work their way up through the mob hierarchy.

fields.title: Seven Samurai
fields.description: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

fields.title: The Matrix
fields.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

fields.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
fields.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

fields.title: City of God
fields.description: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.

fields.title: Se7en
fields.description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.

fields.title: It's a Wonderful Life
fields.description: An angel helps a compassionate but despairingly frustrated businessman by showing what life would have been like if he never existed.

fields.title: Life Is Beautiful
fields.description: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

fields.title: The Usual Suspects
fields.description: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which begin when five criminals meet at a seemingly random police lineup.

fields.title: Interstellar
fields.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

fields.title: The Silence of the Lambs
fields.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

fields.title: Airlift
fields.description: When Iraq invades Kuwait in August, 1990, a callous Indian businessman becomes the spokesperson for more than 170,000 stranded countrymen.

fields.title: Spirited Away
fields.description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen -year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

fields.title: Once Upon a Time in the West
fields.description: Epic story of a mysterious stranger with a harmonica who joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

fields.title: City Lights
fields.description: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

fields.title: The Intouchables
fields.description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

fields.title: Saving Private Ryan
fields.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

fields.title: Casablanca
fields.description: In Casablanca, Morocco in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

fields.title: American History X
fields.description: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

fields.title: Modern Times
fields.description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

fields.title: The Green Mile
fields.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

fields.title: Psycho
fields.description: A Phoenix secretary steals $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

fields.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
fields.description: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the US government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

fields.title: Rear Window
fields.description: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

fields.title: The Pianist
fields.description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

fields.title: The Departed
fields.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

fields.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
fields.description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her young son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg, made out of liquid metal.

fields.title: Gladiator
fields.description: When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

fields.title: Whiplash
fields.description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

fields.title: The Message
fields.description: In the 7th century, Mohammed is visited by Angel Gabriel who urges him to lead the people of Mecca and worship God. But they're exiled in Medina before returning to Mecca to take up arms ...

fields.title: Back to the Future
fields.description: A young man is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his friend, Dr. Emmett Brown, and must make sure his high-school-age parents unite in order to save his own existence.

fields.title: The Prestige
fields.description: Two stage magicians engage in competitive one-upmanship in an attempt to create the ultimate stage illusion.

fields.title: Memento
fields.description: A man creates a strange system to help him remember things; so he can hunt for the murderer of his wife without his short-term memory loss being an obstacle.

fields.title: The Lion King
fields.description: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.

fields.title: Cinema Paradiso
fields.description: A filmmaker recalls his childhood, when he fell in love with the movies at his village's theater and formed a deep friendship with the theater's projectionist.

fields.title: Apocalypse Now
fields.description: During the Vietnam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.

fields.title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
fields.description: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically try to stop.

fields.title: The Great Dictator
fields.description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

fields.title: Baahubali: The Beginning
fields.description: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades old feud between two warring people.

fields.title: The Dark Knight Rises
fields.description: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, the Dark Knight, with the help of the enigmatic Selina, is forced from his imposed exile to save Gotham City, now on the edge of total annihilation, from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

fields.title: Children of Heaven
fields.description: After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.

fields.title: Grave of the Fireflies
fields.description: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

fields.title: The Lives of Others
fields.description: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

fields.title: Alien
fields.description: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as distress call, their landing on the source planet finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform. Continuing their journey back to Earth with the attacked crew having recovered an

fields.title: Paths of Glory
fields.description: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

fields.title: Django Unchained
fields.description: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

fields.title: 3 Idiots
fields.description: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

fields.title: The Shining
fields.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

fields.title: Witness for the Prosecution
fields.description: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

fields.title: Princess Mononoke
fields.description: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

fields.title: American Beauty
fields.description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

fields.title: Das Boot
fields.description: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth, and sheer terror.

fields.title: Once Upon a Time in America
fields.description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

fields.title: Oldboy
fields.description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.

fields.title: Aliens
fields.description: The planet from Alien (1979) has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, the rescue team has impressive firepower, but will it be enough?

fields.title: Citizen Kane
fields.description: Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance.

fields.title: North by Northwest
fields.description: A hapless New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.

fields.title: A Separation
fields.description: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

fields.title: Vertigo
fields.description: A San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

fields.title: Braveheart
fields.description: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

fields.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
fields.description: After rescuing Han Solo from the palace of Jabba the Hutt, the rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to make Vader return from the dark side of the Force.

fields.title: Double Indemnity
fields.description: An insurance representative lets himself be talked into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses an insurance investigator's suspicions.

fields.title: Requiem for a Dream
fields.description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

fields.title: Reservoir Dogs
fields.description: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

fields.title: Lawrence of Arabia
fields.description: The story of TE Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and lead the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War 1 in order to fight the Turks.

fields.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
fields.description: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his kids against prejudice.

fields.title: A Clockwork Orange
fields.description: In future Britain, charismatic delinquent Alex DeLarge is jailed and volunteers for an experimental aversion therapy developed by the government in an effort to solve society's crime problem - but not all goes according to plan.

fields.title: The Kid
fields.description: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

fields.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
fields.description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a procedure to have each other erased from their memories. But it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.

fields.title: Bicycle Thieves
fields.description: Set in Post-WWII Italy, a working class man's bicycle is stolen. He and his son set out to find it.

fields.title: Toy Story 3
fields.description: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

fields.title: Taxi Driver
fields.description: A mentally unstable Vietnam War veteran works as a night-time taxi driver in New York City where the perceived decadence and sleaze feeds his urge for violent action, attempting to save a preadolescent prostitute in the process.

fields.title: Amadeus
fields.description: The incredible story of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, told by his peer and secret rival Antonio Salieri - now confined to an insane asylum.

fields.title: Singin' in the Rain
fields.description: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

fields.title: The Sting
fields.description: In Chicago in September 1936, a young con man seeking revenge for his murdered partner teams up with a master of the big con to win a fortune from a criminal banker.

fields.title: Yojimbo
fields.description: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

fields.title: All About Eve
fields.description: An ingenue insinuates herself in to the company of an established but aging stage actress and her circle of theater friends.

fields.title: Full Metal Jacket
fields.description: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

fields.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
fields.description: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

fields.title: The Hateful Eight
fields.description: The Hateful Eight is a 2015 American western mystery film written and directed by Quentin Tarantino.

fields.title: Zoolander No.2
fields.description: Zoolander 2 (also known as Zoolander No. 2 and 2oolander) is a 2016 American comedy film directed by Ben Stiller and written by John Hamburg, Justin Theroux, Stiller and Nick Stoller.

fields.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

fields.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

fields.description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

fields.title: Oldboy
fields.description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.

fields.title: Aliens
fields.description: The planet from Alien (1979) has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, the rescue team has impressive firepower, but will it be enough?

fields.title: Citizen Kane
fields.description: Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance.

fields.title: North by Northwest
fields.description: A hapless New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.

fields.title: A Separation
fields.description: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

fields.title: Vertigo
fields.description: A San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

fields.title: Braveheart
fields.description: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

fields.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
fields.description: After rescuing Han Solo from the palace of Jabba the Hutt, the rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to make Vader return from the dark side of the Force.

fields.title: Double Indemnity
fields.description: An insurance representative lets himself be talked into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses an insurance investigator's suspicions.

fields.title: Requiem for a Dream
fields.description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

fields.title: Reservoir Dogs
fields.description: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

fields.title: Lawrence of Arabia
fields.description: The story of TE Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and lead the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War 1 in order to fight the Turks.

fields.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
fields.description: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his kids against prejudice.

fields.title: A Clockwork Orange
fields.description: In future Britain, charismatic delinquent Alex DeLarge is jailed and volunteers for an experimental aversion therapy developed by the government in an effort to solve society's crime problem - but not all goes according to plan.

fields.title: The Kid
fields.description: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

fields.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
fields.description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a procedure to have each other erased from their memories. But it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.

fields.title: Bicycle Thieves
fields.description: Set in Post-WWII Italy, a working class man's bicycle is stolen. He and his son set out to find it.

fields.title: Toy Story 3
fields.description: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

fields.title: Taxi Driver
fields.description: A mentally unstable Vietnam War veteran works as a night-time taxi driver in New York City where the perceived decadence and sleaze feeds his urge for violent action, attempting to save a preadolescent prostitute in the process.

fields.title: Amadeus
fields.description: The incredible story of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, told by his peer and secret rival Antonio Salieri - now confined to an insane asylum.

fields.title: Singin' in the Rain
fields.description: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

fields.title: The Sting
fields.description: In Chicago in September 1936, a young con man seeking revenge for his murdered partner teams up with a master of the big con to win a fortune from a criminal banker.

fields.title: Yojimbo
fields.description: A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

fields.title: All About Eve
fields.description: An ingenue insinuates herself in to the company of an established but aging stage actress and her circle of theater friends.

fields.title: Full Metal Jacket
fields.description: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

fields.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
fields.description: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

fields.title: The Hateful Eight
fields.description: The Hateful Eight is a 2015 American western mystery film written and directed by Quentin Tarantino.

fields.title: Zoolander No.2
fields.description: Zoolander 2 (also known as Zoolander No. 2 and 2oolander) is a 2016 American comedy film directed by Ben Stiller and written by John Hamburg, Justin Theroux, Stiller and Nick Stoller.

fields.title: The Shawshank Redemption
fields.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

fields.title: The Godfather
fields.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

fields.title: The Godfather: Part II
fields.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on his crime syndicate stretching from Lake Tahoe, Nevada to pre-revolution 1958 Cuba.

fields.title: The Dark Knight
fields.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the caped crusader must come to terms with one of the greatest psychological tests of his ability to fight injustice.

fields.title: 12 Angry Men
fields.description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

fields.title: Schindler's List
fields.description: In Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
fields.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

fields.title: Pulp Fiction
fields.description: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

fields.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
fields.description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

fields.title: Fight Club
fields.description: An insomniac office worker, looking for a way to change his life, crosses paths with a devil-may-care soap maker, forming an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more...

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
fields.description: A meek Hobbit and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the One Ring and the Dark Lord Sauron.

fields.title: Inception
fields.description: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

fields.title: Forrest Gump
fields.description: Forrest Gump, while not intelligent, has accidentally been present at many historic moments, but his true love, Jenny Curran, eludes him.

fields.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
fields.description: After the rebels have been brutally overpowered by the Empire on their newly established base, Luke Skywalker takes advanced Jedi training with Master Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader as part of his plan to capture Luke.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
fields.description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

fields.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
fields.description: A criminal pleads insanity after getting into trouble again and once in the mental institution rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

fields.title: Goodfellas
fields.description: Henry Hill and his friends work their way up through the mob hierarchy.

fields.title: Seven Samurai
fields.description: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

fields.title: The Matrix
fields.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

fields.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
fields.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

fields.title: City of God
fields.description: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.

fields.title: Se7en
fields.description: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.

fields.title: It's a Wonderful Life
fields.description: An angel helps a compassionate but despairingly frustrated businessman by showing what life would have been like if he never existed.

fields.title: Life Is Beautiful
fields.description: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

fields.title: The Usual Suspects
fields.description: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which begin when five criminals meet at a seemingly random police lineup.

fields.title: Interstellar
fields.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

fields.title: The Silence of the Lambs
fields.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

fields.title: Airlift
fields.description: When Iraq invades Kuwait in August, 1990, a callous Indian businessman becomes the spokesperson for more than 170,000 stranded countrymen.

fields.title: Spirited Away
fields.description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen -year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

fields.title: Once Upon a Time in the West
fields.description: Epic story of a mysterious stranger with a harmonica who joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

fields.title: City Lights
fields.description: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

fields.title: The Intouchables
fields.description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

fields.title: Saving Private Ryan
fields.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

fields.title: Casablanca
fields.description: In Casablanca, Morocco in December 1941, a cynical American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

fields.title: American History X
fields.description: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

fields.title: Modern Times
fields.description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

fields.title: The Green Mile
fields.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

fields.title: Psycho
fields.description: A Phoenix secretary steals $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

fields.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
fields.description: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the US government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

fields.title: Rear Window
fields.description: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

fields.title: The Pianist
fields.description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

fields.title: The Departed
fields.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

fields.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
fields.description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her young son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg, made out of liquid metal.

fields.title: Gladiator
fields.description: When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperor's corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

fields.title: Whiplash
fields.description: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

fields.title: The Message
fields.description: In the 7th century, Mohammed is visited by Angel Gabriel who urges him to lead the people of Mecca and worship God. But they're exiled in Medina before returning to Mecca to take up arms ...

fields.title: Back to the Future
fields.description: A young man is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his friend, Dr. Emmett Brown, and must make sure his high-school-age parents unite in order to save his own existence.

fields.title: The Prestige
fields.description: Two stage magicians engage in competitive one-upmanship in an attempt to create the ultimate stage illusion.

fields.title: Memento
fields.description: A man creates a strange system to help him remember things; so he can hunt for the murderer of his wife without his short-term memory loss being an obstacle.

fields.title: The Lion King
fields.description: Lion cub and future king Simba searches for his identity. His eagerness to please others and penchant for testing his boundaries sometimes gets him into trouble.

fields.title: Cinema Paradiso
fields.description: A filmmaker recalls his childhood, when he fell in love with the movies at his village's theater and formed a deep friendship with the theater's projectionist.

fields.title: Apocalypse Now
fields.description: During the Vietnam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.

fields.title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
fields.description: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically try to stop.

fields.title: The Great Dictator
fields.description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

fields.title: Baahubali: The Beginning
fields.description: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades old feud between two warring people.

fields.title: The Dark Knight Rises
fields.description: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, the Dark Knight, with the help of the enigmatic Selina, is forced from his imposed exile to save Gotham City, now on the edge of total annihilation, from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

fields.title: Children of Heaven
fields.description: After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.

fields.title: Grave of the Fireflies
fields.description: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

fields.title: The Lives of Others
fields.description: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

fields.title: Alien
fields.description: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as distress call, their landing on the source planet finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform. Continuing their journey back to Earth with the attacked crew having recovered an

fields.title: Paths of Glory
fields.description: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

fields.title: Django Unchained
fields.description: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

fields.title: 3 Idiots
fields.description: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

fields.title: The Shining
fields.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and of the future.

fields.title: Witness for the Prosecution
fields.description: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

fields.title: Princess Mononoke
fields.description: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

fields.title: American Beauty
fields.description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

fields.title: Das Boot
fields.description: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth, and sheer terror.

fields.title: Once Upon a Time in America
fields.description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

fields.title: Oldboy
fields.description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for 15 years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in 5 days.

fields.title: Aliens
fields.description: The planet from Alien (1979) has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, the rescue team has impressive firepower, but will it be enough?

fields.title: Citizen Kane
fields.description: Following the death of a publishing tycoon, news reporters scramble to discover the meaning of his final utterance.

fields.title: North by Northwest
fields.description: A hapless New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.

fields.title: A Separation
fields.description: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

fields.description: A San Francisco detective suffering from acrophobia investigates the strange activities of an old friend's wife, all the while becoming dangerously obsessed with her.

fields.title: Braveheart
fields.description: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt against King Edward I of England.

fields.description: After rescuing Han Solo from the palace of Jabba the Hutt, the rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to make Vader return from the dark side of the Force.

fields.description: An insurance representative lets himself be talked into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses an insurance investigator's suspicions.

fields.description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

fields.title: Lawrence of Arabia
fields.description: The story of TE Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and lead the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War 1 in order to fight the Turks.

fields.description: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his kids against prejudice.

fields.description: In future Britain, charismatic delinquent Alex DeLarge is jailed and volunteers for an experimental aversion therapy developed by the government in an effort to solve society's crime problem - but not all goes according to plan.

fields.description: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

fields.description: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a procedure to have each other erased from their memories. But it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.

fields.description: Set in Post-WWII Italy, a working class man's bicycle is stolen. He and his son set out to find it.
